course.subject: SBMT
course.name: General Macroeconomics- Wall Street in Crisis Situations
course.description: The course will give the students an overview of the world of global finance, how does “wall street” really work, detailing to the various markets, products and customers in the system. The course will also introduce key macroeconomic indicators and how market participants use this information to make financing and investment decisions. The course will finish by taking an in-depth look at markets today amidst the extraordinary conditions, how things have changed from past crisis and how the market and government response.
